channel.title: Forums
channel.description:
ok i use moparisthebest.com but ive never really used mitb before so im not sure if this is where it goes or not BUT
i want to make a forum using simple machines i have a hoster but how do i get the forum online?

item.title: Forums
item.dc:creator: @ada ada
item.description:
@ada wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:7, topic:213638”][quote author=magma828 link=topic=281180.msg2286064#msg2286064 date=1213924600]

Yep.

It would fail because we would all spam it, thousands would be banned, and everyone would keep getting “Connection Problems”.
[/quote]
No, because he won’t use a modified ban system with 15K+ ban triggers which sucks.[/quote]

That’s what happens if you create some half baked split forum system that is clunky and doesn’t work properly… I mean, the search feature doesn’t even work properly… It shows posts from moparisthebest.com and moparisthebest.com, no matter what site you are on!

Read full topic

item.title: Forums
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“magma828, post:1, topic:213752”][quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=281180.msg2286004#msg2286004 date=1213922140]
Yep.
[/quote]

It would fail because we would all spam it, thousands would be banned, and everyone would keep getting “Connection Problems”.[/quote]
No, because he won’t use a modified ban system with 15K+ ban triggers which sucks.

Read full topic

item.title: Forums
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:2, topic:213638”]You kill yourself. And in your last living testament tell your parents to go here:
http://www.simplemachines.org/download/index.php?thanks;filename=webinstall.php
And then upload it to the directory they want to install it, then create a database/user, and give the file 777 permission.[/quote]
that way his parents can make a forum about their dead child?

Read full topic

item.title: Forums
item.dc:creator: @xbverx xbverx
item.description:
@xbverx wrote:

or your host might have fanstastico installer then just use that.

Read full topic
